cast.overview: Superman, a journalist in Metropolis, embarks on a journey to reconcile his Kryptonian heritage with his human upbringing as Clark Kent.
cast.title: Superman

details.biography:
Sara Pinto Sampaio (born 21 July 1991) is a Portuguese model and actress, best known for being a Victoria's Secret Angel. She is a Giorgio Armani beauty ambassador and works for Calzedonia.She was named Best Female Model at the Globos de Ouro (Portuguese Golden Globes) in 2011, 2012, 2014, 2015, and 2016. In 2019, she was the winner of Fashion Personality of the Year.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Sara Pinto Sampaio, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Sara Sampaio
